text: "The Whole World Lost Its Head" is a 1994 song by American new wave band The Go-Go's and taken from their album Return to the Valley of The Go-Go's. It went to number 29 in the United Kingdom and was their one and only top 40 hit in the United Kingdom. Category:1994 songs Category:The Go-Go's songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: The Whole World Lost Its Head
